text:
Tab Payments

We're building products to make dining experiences awesome! Right now, we're working on mobile payments at restaurants.

We're funded by prominent people in the restaurant and entertainment industry in Toronto (restauranteurs, Toronto Maple Leafs, etc.) We've also had startups before with successful exits.

We're currently looking to grow our engineering team and hiring for Android engineers with serious dev chops.

No remote. Located in Toronto. fahd@tabpayments.co if you're interested.
